message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you could be even greater. Considering its significance and the benefits it offers, I am extending a special offer to you. I propose selling the product to you for $14,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between the intrinsic value of the product and maximizing my earnings while providing you with a reasonable discount compared to its perceived worth. I believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both of us. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
